metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31796 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: libjpeg 1.63 has a heap-based buffer over-read in HierarchicalBitmapRequester::FetchRegion in hierarchicalbitmaprequester.cpp because the MCU size can be different between allocation and use.

notes.Note: jdstrand> libjpeg-turbo is a fork of libjpeg8

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libjpeg6b: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
libjpeg9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
